data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Patel Retail Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from August 26 2025 the equity shares of Patel Retail Ltd  (Scrip Code: 544487) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of T Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250825- dated August 25 2025.
